bill.title: Elections; Campaign Financing
bill.description: Updates, organizes, and clarifies current campaign financing laws. Effective upon approval. (SD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 01-26-10 2:30 pm in House conference room 325.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 01-28-10.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Thursday, 1/28/2010 2:30:00 PM in conference room 325.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 02-02-10, 2:00 pm.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 2/2/2010 2:00 PM in conference room 325.
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 02-09-10, 2:00 PM.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-09-10 2:30pm in conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, Ito, Carroll, Herkes, Mizuno, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti, McKelvey, Morita, Wakai, Marumoto, Thielen; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Luke.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 404-10) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Ching, Finnegan, Pine, Rhoads, Saiki, Ward voting no (6) and Representative(s) Bertram, Cabanilla, Takumi excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-22-10 2:30PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org
(H) The committee(s) recommends that the measure be deferred until 02-23-10.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-23-10 5:00PM in conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Aquino, Awana, Brower, Choy, Coffman, Har, Keith-Agaran, Nishimoto, Sagum, Tokioka, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) C. Lee, Wooley, Finnegan; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 666-10) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-02-10.
(H) Floor Amendment No. 2 offered by Rep. Marumoto
(H) Floor Amendment No. 2 withdrawn by Rep. Marumoto
(H) Floor Amendment No. 4 offered by Rep. C. Lee
(H) Floor amendment adopted with none voting no and none excused.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 3 with none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Bertram, Har, Pine, Thielen excused (4). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 254).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JGO.
(S) The committee(s) on JGO has scheduled a public hearing on 03-24-10 9:30AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JGO deferred the measure until 03-30-10 10:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JGO recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JGO were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Takamine, Bunda, Gabbard, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from JGO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2978) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-06-10.
(S) Floor Amendment No. 11 offered.
(S) Floor amendment adopted as amended (SD 2).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-10.

(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 19; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Tsutsui . Noes, 4 (Senator(s) Hemmings, Hooser, Ihara, Slom). Excused, 2 (Senator(s) Hee, Tokuda). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 497) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 471).
(H) House conferees appointed: Karamatsu, M. Oshiro Co-Chairs; Luke, B. Oshiro.
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 558).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Taniguchi, Chair; Nishihara, Takamine.
(H) House conferee(s) added: Representative(s) Marumoto.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 576).
(S) Received notice of change in conferees (Hse. Com. No. 563).
(H) Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-15-10 2:15PM in conference room 325.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday 04-19-10 2:15PM in conference room 325.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Tuesday 04-20-10 2:15PM in conference room 325.

(H) The House Conference Managers recommend to agree to the Senate Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Karamatsu, M. Oshiro, Luke, B. Oshiro; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Marumoto.
(H) Reconsideration of action taken on 04-08-10.
(S) Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 616).
(H) Deferred to Monday, 04-26-10.
(H) Deferred to Tuesday, 04-27-10.
(H) House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
(H) Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 2 with none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
(S) Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 628).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
(H) Became law without the Governor's signature, Act 211, 7/6/2010, (Gov. Msg. No. 465).
(S) Became law without the Governor's signature, Act 211, 7/6/2010, (Gov. Msg. No. 703).
